And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> an angel<S>32</S> come down<S>2597</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, having<S>2192</S> the key<S>2807</S> of the bottomless pit<S>12</S> and<S>2532</S> a great<S>3173</S> chain<S>254</S> in<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he laid hold on<S>2902</S> the dragon<S>1404</S>, that old<S>744</S> serpent<S>3789</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> the Devil<S>1228</S>, and<S>2532</S> Satan<S>4567</S>, and<S>2532</S> bound<S>1210</S> him<S>846</S> a thousand<S>5507</S> years<S>2094</S>,
And<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> him<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> the bottomless pit<S>12</S>, and<S>2532</S> shut<S>2808</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>2808</S>, and<S>2532</S> set a seal<S>4972</S> upon<S>1883</S> him<S>846</S>, that<S>3363</S> he should deceive<S>4105</S> the nations<S>1484</S> no<S>3363</S> more<S>2089</S>, till<S>891</S> the thousand<S>5507</S> years<S>2094</S> should be fulfilled<S>5055</S>: and<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> that<S>5023</S> he<S>846</S> must<S>1163</S> be loosed<S>3089</S> a little<S>3398</S> season<S>5550</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> thrones<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> they sat<S>2523</S> upon<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> judgment<S>2917</S> was given<S>1325</S> unto them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> I saw the souls<S>5590</S> of them that were beheaded<S>3990</S> for<S>1223</S> the witness<S>3141</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> for<S>1223</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> which<S>3748</S> had<S>4352</S> not<S>3756</S> worshipped<S>4352</S> the beast<S>2342</S>, neither<S>3777</S> his<S>846</S> image<S>1504</S>,<S>2532</S> neither<S>3756</S> had received<S>2983</S> his mark<S>5480</S> upon<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> foreheads<S>3359</S>, or<S>2532</S> in<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S>; and<S>2532</S> they lived<S>2198</S> and<S>2532</S> reigned<S>936</S> with<S>3326</S> Christ<S>5547</S> a thousand<S>5507</S> years<S>2094</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the rest<S>3062</S> of the dead<S>3498</S> lived<S>326</S> not<S>3756</S> again<S>326</S> until<S>2193</S> the thousand<S>5507</S> years<S>2094</S> were finished<S>5055</S>. This<S>3778</S> is the first<S>4413</S> resurrection<S>386</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> and<S>2532</S> holy<S>40</S> is he that hath<S>2192</S> part<S>3313</S> in<S>1722</S> the first<S>4413</S> resurrection<S>386</S>: on<S>1909</S> such<S>5130</S> the second<S>1208</S> death<S>2288</S> hath<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> power<S>1849</S>, but<S>235</S> they shall be<S>2071</S> priests<S>2409</S> of God<S>2316</S> and<S>2532</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall reign<S>936</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S> a thousand<S>5507</S> years<S>2094</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> the thousand<S>5507</S> years<S>2094</S> are expired<S>5055</S>, Satan<S>4567</S> shall be loosed<S>3089</S> out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> prison<S>5438</S>,
And<S>2532</S> shall go out<S>1831</S> to deceive<S>4105</S> the nations<S>1484</S> which<S>3588</S> are in<S>1722</S> the four<S>5064</S> quarters<S>1137</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, Gog<S>1136</S> and<S>2532</S> Magog<S>3098</S>, to gather<S>4863</S> them<S>846</S> together<S>4863</S> to<S>1519</S> battle<S>4171</S>: the number<S>706</S> of whom<S>3739</S> is as<S>5613</S> the sand<S>285</S> of the sea<S>2281</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they went up<S>305</S> on<S>1909</S> the breadth<S>4114</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> compassed<S>2944</S> the camp<S>3925</S> of the saints<S>40</S> about<S>2944</S>, and<S>2532</S> the beloved<S>25</S> city<S>4172</S>: and<S>2532</S> fire<S>4442</S> came down<S>2597</S> from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> out of<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, and<S>2532</S> devoured<S>2719</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the devil<S>1228</S> that deceived<S>4105</S> them<S>846</S> was cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the lake<S>3041</S> of fire<S>4442</S> and<S>2532</S> brimstone<S>2303</S>, where<S>3699</S> the beast<S>2342</S> and<S>2532</S> the false prophet<S>5578</S> are, and<S>2532</S> shall be tormented<S>928</S> day<S>2250</S> and<S>2532</S> night<S>3571</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> a great<S>3173</S> white<S>3022</S> throne<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> him that sat<S>2521</S> on<S>1909</S> it<S>846</S>, from<S>575</S> whose<S>3739</S> face<S>4383</S> the earth<S>1093</S> and<S>2532</S> the heaven<S>3772</S> fled away<S>5343</S>; and<S>2532</S> there was found<S>2147</S> no<S>3756</S> place<S>5117</S> for them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, small<S>3398</S> and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S>, stand<S>2476</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>; and<S>2532</S> the books<S>975</S> were opened<S>455</S>: and<S>2532</S> another<S>243</S> book<S>975</S> was opened<S>455</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> the book of life<S>2222</S>: and<S>2532</S> the dead<S>3498</S> were judged<S>2919</S> out of<S>1537</S> those things which were written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the books<S>975</S>, according to<S>2596</S> their<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the sea<S>2281</S> gave up<S>1325</S> the dead<S>3498</S> which<S>3588</S> were in<S>1722</S> it<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> death<S>2288</S> and<S>2532</S> hell<S>86</S> delivered up<S>1325</S> the dead<S>3498</S> which<S>3588</S> were in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> they were judged<S>2919</S> every man<S>1538</S> according to<S>2596</S> their<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S>. <sup>hell: or, the grave</sup>
And<S>2532</S> death<S>2288</S> and<S>2532</S> hell<S>86</S> were cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the lake<S>3041</S> of fire<S>4442</S>. This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the second<S>1208</S> death<S>2288</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whosoever<S>1536</S> was<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S> found<S>2147</S> written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the book<S>976</S> of life<S>2222</S> was cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the lake<S>3041</S> of fire<S>4442</S>.
